CustomField.description:
Field used to capture time of a workflow rule whenever changes happen on an Account record to specific fields checked in the workflow rule criteria.
Workflow Rule Name: Account data has changed
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Field used to capture time of a workflow rule whenever changes happen on an Account record to specific fields checked in the workflow rule criteria.
Workflow Rule Name: Account data has changed
CustomField.label: ECENTA Timestamp
